wikipedia_page.main: Eddie Ladd is a Welsh television presenter and leading dance and performance artist.

response: * Eddie Ladd - Welsh Physical Theatre performer and dancer
*Eddie Ladd, award-winning Welsh contemporary dancer, known for her controversial themes and presentation style.

The programme was presented by Eddie Ladd.Gareth Bicknell, "Avant-garde Eddie is one of the Ladds; Gareth Bicknell gets to grips with the real and imaginary world of Eddie Ladd", Daily Post (Liverpool), 27 September 2003.
